ing: 2 cups uncooked whole grain elbow macaroni
8 ounces processed American cheese, cubed (VelveetaÂ® or KraftÂ®)
1 link JohnsonvilleÂ® Smoked or Three-Cheese Italian Style Premium Cooking Sausage, quartered and sliced
des: "This classic dish gets upgraded with Johnsonville! While many reach for the boxed stuff, this quick and easy recipe shows you how easy homemade can be. Take your favorite elbow macaroni, butter, flour, milk and American cheese to create a delicious meal that everyone loves. For the real treat, add in some Johnsonville Smoked Sausage for that extra hit of savory goodness. For you cheese lovers, Johnsonville Three Cheese Italian Style Cooking Sausage is the perfect match."
ins:
Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain.
Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.
Stir in flour until smooth; gradually whisk in milk.
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese; cook and stir until melted.
Stir in macaroni and sausage. Enjoy!
